verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when they had passed <S%G1353>through<s%> <S%G295>Amphipolis<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G624>Apollonia<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2596>as<s%> his manner <S%G1486>was<s%>, went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>,

<S%G1272>Opening<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3908>alleging<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> must <S%G1163>needs<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> risen <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2605>preach<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>. whom: or, whom, said he, I preach

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3982>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4345>consorted<s%> with <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> of the <S%G4576>devout<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of the <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which believed <S%G544>not<s%>, moved with <S%G2206>envy<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> took unto <S%G4355>them<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4190>lewd<s%> <S%G435>fellows<s%> of the baser <S%G60>sort<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> gathered a <S%G3792>company<s%>, and set <S%G2350>all<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> on an <S%G2350>uproar<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2186>assaulted<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason<s%>, and <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>out<s%> to the <S%G1218>people<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, they <S%G4951>drew<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the rulers of the <S%G4173>city<s%>, <S%G994>crying<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> that have <S%G387>turned<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> upside <S%G387>down<s%> are <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1759>hither<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>;

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> hath <S%G5264>received<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G561>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king<s%>, one <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G5015>troubled<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the rulers of the <S%G4173>city<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G2425>security<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3062>other<s%>, they <S%G630>let<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G630>go<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> sent <S%G1599>away<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G960>Berea<s%>: <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3854>coming<s%> thither <S%G549>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> more <S%G2104>noble<s%> than those <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%>, in that <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> readiness of <S%G4288>mind<s%>, and <S%G350>searched<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> <S%G2250>daily<s%> <S%G2596><s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> those <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>; <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2158>honourable<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1674>Greeks<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G435>men<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> had <S%G1097>knowledge<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2605>preached<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G960>Berea<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> thither <S%G2546>also<s%>, and stirred <S%G4531>up<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> sent <S%G1821>away<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> <S%G5278>abode<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G5278>still<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they that <S%G2525>conducted<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G116>Athens<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>receiving<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with all <S%G5613>speed<s%> <S%G5033><s%>, they <S%G1826>departed<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> while <S%G3972>Paul<s%> waited <S%G1551>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G116>Athens<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G3947>stirred<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, when he <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> wholly <S%G5607>given<s%> to <S%G2712>idolatry<s%>. wholly: or, full of idols

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3303><s%> disputed <S%G1256>he<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with the devout <S%G4576>persons<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> them that met with <S%G3909>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5386>philosophers<s%> of the <S%G1946>Epicureans<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4770>Stoicks<s%>, <S%G4820>encountered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G302>will<s%> <S%G2309><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4691>babbler<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%><S%G1161>?<s%> other some, He <S%G1380>seemeth<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> a setter <S%G2604>forth<s%> of <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1140>gods<s%>: <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%>. babbler: or, base fellow

<S%G5037>And<s%> they <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and brought <S%G71>him<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G697>Areopagus<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1410>May<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>, <S%G5259>whereof<s%> <S%G4675>thou<s%> <S%G2980>speakest<s%>, is? Areopagus: or, Mars-hill: it was the highest court in Athens

<S%G1063>For<s%> thou <S%G1533>bringest<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> strange <S%G3579>things<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>ears<s%>: we <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G302>mean<s%> <S%G2309><s%> <S%G1511><s%>.

<S%G1161>(For<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G117>Athenians<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1927>there<s%> spent their <S%G2119>time<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2087>else<s%>, but <S%G2228>either<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%>, <S%G2532>or<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> new <S%G2537>thing<s%>.)

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of Mars' <S%G697>hill<s%>, and <S%G5346>said<s%>, Ye <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G117>Athens<s%>, I <S%G2334>perceive<s%> <S%G5613>that<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> are too <S%G1174>superstitious<s%>. Mars' hill: or, court of the Areopagites

<S%G1063>For<s%> as I passed <S%G1330>by<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G333>beheld<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4574>devotions<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> I <S%G2147>found<s%> an <S%G1041>altar<s%> with <S%G1722>this<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1924>inscription<s%>, TO THE <S%G57>UNKNOWN<s%> <S%G2316>GOD<s%>. <S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> ye <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G2151>worship<s%>, <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G2605>declare<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>. devotions: or, gods that ye worship

<S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%>, seeing that <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G5225>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3485>temples<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands<s%>;

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> is <S%G2323>worshipped<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G444>men's<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, as though he <S%G4326>needed<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%>, seeing <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4157>breath<s%>, <S%G2596>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>;

<S%G5037>And<s%> hath <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> for to <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, and hath <S%G3724>determined<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> before <S%G4384>appointed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3734>bounds<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2733>habitation<s%>;

That they should <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>haply<s%> they might <S%G5584>feel<s%> after <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> find <S%G2147>him<s%>, <S%G2544>though<s%> he <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2795>move<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have our <S%G2070>being<s%>; <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G2596>own<s%> <S%G4163>poets<s%> have <S%G2046>said<s%>, <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5120>his<s%> <S%G1085>offspring<s%>.

Forasmuch <S%G3767>then<s%> as we <S%G5225>are<s%> the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, we <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3543>think<s%> that the <S%G2304>Godhead<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G696>silver<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%>, <S%G5480>graven<s%> by <S%G5078>art<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G1761>device<s%>.

<S%G3303>And<s%> <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> of this <S%G52>ignorance<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> winked <S%G5237>at<s%>; but <S%G3569>now<s%> <S%G3853>commandeth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> every <S%G3837>where<s%> to <S%G3340>repent<s%>:

<S%G1360>Because<s%> he hath <S%G2476>appointed<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> that <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he hath <S%G3724>ordained<s%>; whereof he hath <S%G3930>given<s%> <S%G4102>assurance<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> men, in that he hath <S%G450>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>. hath given: or, offered faith

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G3303>some<s%> <S%G5512>mocked<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> others <S%G2036>said<s%>, We will <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> matter.
<S%G2532>So<s%> <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>Howbeit<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2853>clave<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G4100>believed<s%>: <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1354>Dionysius<s%> the <S%G698>Areopagite<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1152>Damaris<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
